about..acknowledgments-text: This application is built using Tauri, Angular, PrimeNG and other amazing open-source libraries. Special thanks to the developers and communities behind these projects.

plugin..uninstall-confirm: Do you also want to remove the plugin related clips?

auto-start-application..title: Auto-start application
auto-start-application..description: Starts automatically when you sign in

auto-delete-clips..title: Auto-delete clips
auto-delete-clips..description: Automatically deletes clips older than specified period (pinned clips are kept)

snapping..title: Snapping
snapping..description: Allows you to automatically position the paste window based on the selected option

size..title: Size
size..description: Allows you to specify the size of the paste window

pinned-clips-area-size..title: Pinned clips area size
pinned-clips-area-size..description: Allows you to specify the size (height in percentage) of the pinned clips area in the paste window

opacity..title: Opacity
opacity..description: Allows you to control the degree of transparency of the paste window

language-setting-descriptions: The language of the user interface

theme-mode..setting-description: The visual appearance of the user interface
